{"id":480160172,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1618325955,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"64 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/480160172/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"20 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector< vector<int> > ret;\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) {\n            if (i > 0 && nums[i] == nums[i - 1]) continue;\n            int target = -nums[i];\n            int j = i + 1, k = nums.size() - 1;\n            while(j < k) {\n                if (nums[j] + nums[k] < target) \n                    j++;\n                else if (nums[j] + nums[k] > target)\n                    k--;\n                else {\n                    ret.push_back(vector<int>{nums[i],nums[j],nums[k]});\n                    while (j < k && nums[j] == nums[j + 1]) j++;\n                    while (j < k && nums[k] == nums[k - 1]) k--;\n                    j++;\n                    k--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
